subject: RE: [junit] DbUnit & ORM
msgSnippet: ... It covers a lot of recipes on 700 pages. Read a few books about JUnit, I suggest. You probably don t speak German, but I want to suggest two good books
messageBody:
--- Shane Mingins <shanemingins@...> wrote:
>
> 10x? It's about $100 in the shops here ;-)
>
> It's moving close to the top of my list though.
>
> Cheers
> Shane

It covers a lot of recipes on 700 pages.

Read a few books about JUnit, I suggest. You probably
don't speak German, but I want to suggest two good
books about JUnit for the German readers of this
forum: "Softwaretests mit JUnit" by Johannes Link and
the not yet released "Testgetriebene Entwicklung mit
JUnit und FIT" by Frank Westphal.

To become a master of JUnit it takes years of
practice, although it is easy to learn the basics.
